description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a settings screen in a mobile application. It allows users to toggle notifications, switch high contrast mode, and select a language, with UI elements such as app bar, navigation drawer, and a list of preferences.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the settings screen where user preferences can be set.

classes.name: _SettingsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI and behavior for the SettingsScreen, including toggles for notifications, contrast, and language selection.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the SettingsScreen widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the settings screen, including UI for toggles and dropdown.
